scripts.clean-install: npx rimraf package-lock.json && npx rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.npmpack: npm run clean-install && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-common-webdav-4.0.2.tgz && npx shx cp -rL ./package/** ../../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-common-webdav && npx rimraf package
